resources.string:
Are you ready?
 
 • 5-20 minutes you won’t be interrupted
 • A place you can sit comfortably
 • Pulse oximeter
 	 • On your left middle or ring finger
 • BP monitor
 	 • With the cuff over the left arm
 • Valsalva box and tube
 	 • Power connected (red light on)

Ready for Valsalva
 
 • Have tube ready to blow into
 • Once you press Start, there will be a rest period
 • Wait for screen to change
 • Take a deep breath, blow into the tube so light is green
 • When screen changes back, breathe normally and take tube out of mouth
 • Wait till end of second rest period

Ready for Stroop
 
 • Names of colors will appear on the screen.
 • Choose the color the words are written in.
 • Click the button below when you’re ready.

Ready for Breath-hold
 
 • Once you press Start, there will be a rest period
 • Wait for screen to change
 • Breathe all the way out, breath in fully, and hold
 • When screen changes back, breathe normally
 • Wait till end of second rest period

Ready for reaction test
 
 • When you see a red dot, tap the screen

Ready for Breathing Awareness
 
 • Select audio option

Checking pulseox connection…
 
 • Place pulseox on finger
 • Light should turn green after a few seconds

Blood Pressure
 
 • Take blood pressure
 • Enter three values

Rest
 
 • Wait for screen to change

Rest
 
 • breathe normally and take tube out of mouth

Rest
 
 • Wait for screen to change

Rest
 
 • breathe normally
 • Wait till end of second rest period
• Take a deep breath, blow into the tube so light is green
• Breathe all the way out, breath in fully, and hold
